      • getExtraView

        public android.view.View getExtraView()
        Description copied from interface: HierarchyListItem
        Returns the extra view, if any, associated with the node. The extra view occupies the space to the right of the line item and can be defined as the developer sees fit. Clicks should be passed through so you can include simple stuff like text, or more interactive things like buttons or check boxes. Should occupy space nicely with range and bearing values if any are present. If no extra view is associated with the node, the space will be empty.
        Specified by:
        getExtraView in interface HierarchyListItem
        Returns:
        The extra view associated with this node, or null if there is no view.

      • refresh

        @Deprecated
public HierarchyListItem.Sort refresh(HierarchyListItem.Sort sort)
        Deprecated. This method will become final
        Sort children based on filter's sort To avoid UI thread slowdown avoid calling this use sortItems on a separate list and copy to this.children instead
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface HierarchyListItem
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface HierarchyListItem2
        Parameters:
        sort - Sort object (usually this.filter.sort)
        Returns:
        The new sort object, in case it's changed
